description: Momo Belia Deviluke is one of http://anidb.net/ch2355 [Lala]`s twin younger sisters. She is introduced when most of the characters are in a virtual game world created by Lala that she and Nana subsequently modify. Momo has short hair and is generally sweeter than her twin http://anidb.net/ch13068 [Nana], but she develops a bad attitude whenever Nana takes credit for what she does. She shares a connection to and can communicate with plant life. Like her elder sister, she too has a cellphone capable of transporting objects; however, instead of gadgets, Momo summons plants.
name: Momo Belia Deviluke
